description: Elden Ring is an open-world action RPG by FromSoftware featuring vast exploration, deep lore, and challenging combat in a dark fantasy world co-created by George R.R. Martin.
God of War: Ragnarok continues Kratos and Atreus' journey through Norse mythology with epic combat, stunning visuals, and a powerful father-son narrative.
Set in the 1800s Wizarding World, Hogwarts Legacy lets you become a student at Hogwarts, master spells, and uncover magical secrets in an expansive RPG experience.
Swing through New York as Peter Parker and Miles Morales in Marvel’s Spider-Man 2, featuring new abilities, villains like Venom, and an emotionally rich story.

product: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description: The sequel to Breath of the Wild, Tears of the Kingdom expands the open world of Hyrule with new sky islands, abilities, and a deeper mystery surrounding the kingdom’s past.
Cyberpunk 2077 is a futuristic open-world RPG set in Night City, offering deep character customization, branching narratives, and immersive first-person gameplay.
Resident Evil 4 Remake revives the survival horror classic with modern graphics, tighter gameplay, and enhanced atmospheric tension as Leon Kennedy returns to rescue the president’s daughter.
Final Fantasy XVI brings a dark fantasy world to life with real-time action combat, Eikon battles, and a rich storyline centered around the fate of the kingdom of Valisthea.
Starfield is Bethesda's massive space exploration RPG, featuring over 1,000 planets, customizable ships, and deep character development in a universe waiting to be explored.
Return to the roots of stealth and parkour in Assassin’s Creed Mirage, following the story of Basim in 9th century Baghdad as he transforms from street thief to Master Assassin.
Experience a gripping narrative in Detroit: Become Human. Your choices shape the fate of three androids as they navigate a near-future world on the brink of revolution.
Ride into the heart of the Wild West with Arthur Morgan in Red Dead Redemption 2. This immersive open-world masterpiece offers breathtaking landscapes, deep storytelling, and intense action.
